scripts.dev:client: cd client && pnpm dev && cd ../server && pnpm dev
scripts.dev: concurrently  --names 'client,server,engine,db-processor,ws' --prefix '{name}' -c 'auto' 'pnpm dev:client' 'pnpm dev:server' 'pnpm dev:engine' 'pnpm dev:db-processor' 'pnpm dev:ws'
scripts.build: cd client && pnpm build && cd ../server && pnpm build
scripts.service:up: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yaml up -d mq db && echo 'Lets wait, Postgres is waking up...' && sleep 20
